question: What is the measurement of Line_M_0_M_1?
qt_description: Line Line_M_0_M_1 (Description: Connect midpoints M_0 (of line L0) and M_1 (of line L5))
description:
原始图形描述: Base shape is a regular 6-sided polygon (center O1) with side length 5, rotation angle pi/6 radians. Total 1 derivation rounds. Round 1: applying 'concentric' rule. Concentric derivation: 6-sided polygon (center O1) scaled by 1/2. Found 13 total points (including intersections). Geometry finalized: 0 new lines and 0 new arcs generated by splitting. Total lines: 12, total arcs: 0, total points: 13.
增强操作总轮数: 1
第 1 轮操作（共 1 步）:
  第 1 步: Connect midpoints M_0 (of line L0) and M_1 (of line L5)
api_results:
In the given diagram, a regular hexagon with center O1 and side length 5 is inscribed, rotated by π/6 radians. A concentric, scaled-down hexagon (scaled by 1/2) is drawn inside it, sharing the same center O1. Points M₀ and M₁ are defined as the midpoints of two adjacent sides of the outer hexagon — specifically, M₀ lies on side AB and M₁ lies on side AF. A line segment M₀M₁ is drawn connecting these two midpoints.

What is the measurement of Line M₀M₁?
